Texts.Chs: 找到洞穴并调查^cyan;能量源^reset;
Texts.Eng: Find the cavern and investigate the ^cyan;Energy Source^reset;

Texts.Chs: 也许这个友好的生物可以帮助我^green;修理飞船^reset;并摆脱这个恒星系统。无论通过哪种方式，我都需要使用^orange;三度仪^reset;尽我所能进行研究。
Texts.Eng: Perhaps this friendly creature can help me ^green;repair the ship^reset; and get away from this star system. I'll need to work at it either way, using my ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; to conduct research whenever I can.

Texts.Chs: 研究^cyan;农业^reset;并制作一个^orange;采集工作站^reset;
研究^cyan;工程^reset;并制作^orange;加工台^reset;
感谢^green;维纳利斯^reset;，你已经成功完成了逃离这个星球的第一步。它给了你附近^orange;黑暗洞穴·^reset;的^orange;钥匙^reset;；并希望你去检查其中^green;能源^reset;，其可能对您的维修至关重要。
Texts.Eng: Thanks to ^green;Vinalisj^reset;, you've managed your first steps towards escaping this planet. He's given you a key for a nearby ^orange;Dark Cavern^reset; and wants you to check it for ^green;Energy Sources^reset; that may prove vital in your repairs.

Texts.Chs: 用^cyan;加工台^reset;做一块^orange;电磁铁^orange;
Texts.Eng: Use a ^cyan;Machining Table^reset; to create an ^orange;Electromagnet^reset;
